name: Polymateria Limited
goal:
One third of the world’s plastic ends up in the natural environment after use, and will stay there for hundreds of years.
Polymateria is a British company founded with the mission to tackle this global environmental issue through the power of scientific excellence. Polymateria R&D is focused on providing solutions for the end-life of plastics.

Polymateria develops drop-in additives for plastic products and packaging that provide for time-controlled biodegradability. Polymateria technology can be applied to a wide range of consumer plastic products and packaging, and is especially well suited to packaging that escapes collection systems – such as takeaway and food packaging.

Polymateria advanced biodegradation technology provides for:
• Biodegradability: breakdown of synthetic polymer based products into biomass, CO2 and water
• Time controlled: packaging performance unaffected throughout shelf & use life; degradation triggered thereafter
• Recyclable: within the packaging’s useful life
• Simple and cost effective: easy for any polymer converter to add to process; small on-cost
• Partnership and accountability: we work with our partners from pilot to testing & validation to scale up, to ensure results and performance to be proud of.

Polymateria sells its technology through licence agreements with large operators and manufacturers, delivering bespoke technology in the form of masterbatch additives.
interests: Climate Action, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation
